title: Hybrid Recursive Model-Based Education for Enhancing Business Writing Competency (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic document drafting experience and understanding of mathematical logical structures
context.additional_context: Necessity of linking mathematics domain experts with business practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can write three types of workplace reports (proposals, analytical reports, and summary memos) required in professional settings within four weeks, following a hybrid recursive model.
Learners can apply a structured framework (introduction-body-conclusion) to draft documents and convey core content within 30 minutes.
Learners can improve document clarity and persuasiveness by over 20% using peer feedback and cognitive rhetoric techniques.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
